price: D’elle, Il fait pousser pour vous, les cultures, les oliviers, les palmiers, les vignes et aussi toutes sortes de fruits. Voilà bien là une preuve pour des gens qui réfléchissent.
arabic: يُنۢبِتُ لَكُم بِهِ ٱلزَّرۡعَ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونَ وَٱلنَّخِيلَ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَٰبَ وَمِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yunbitu lakum bihi al-zarʿa wal-zaytūna wal-nakhīla wal-aʿnāba wamin kulli al-thamarāti inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yatafakkarūna
